website_summaries.verdict: This blanket gives you 2 temperature settings for more comfort control in your car.
pros: Designed with thermostat and 2-level heat control
Equipped with 63-inch fused cord with LED indicator
cons: Plug may not stay easily in vehicle lighter outlet

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage!! Worked a few times last Winter and dead this year. Blinking controller and not heating. Hate being ripped off! Update: Company contacted me and sent a new product out. Pretty damn good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D-E-V-o

customer_reviews.title: Preheats sleeping bags nicely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a camping trip, for a place I usually get way too cold at night. I brought a car battery and stuck it just outside my tent and brought a long cable to hook it up (12v female to battery clamps). It was wonderful to get into that pre-heated sleeping bag. It was too hot to run it beyond the initial sleeping bag heat up.
customer_reviews.author: JuliesJunction

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a trucker and got this to help keep me warm in the extremely cold weather cause I don't like to use my bunk heater, this blanket made a massive difference and really helped keep me warm.
customer_reviews.author: James Esco

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and very warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket and kicked myself for not getting sooner. I used it for my rv and instead of heating entire rv. Just cozy up with this blanket. Save energy. Get warm in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: 442 Ojisan

customer_reviews.title: Good for winter season
customer_reviews.text: I use this electric blanket right away after receiving it. We go to skit last weekend. My little one were frozen coming back to the car after playing snow. I wraped her up with the blanket and she felt much better after a few minutes. It is soft and comfortable. Worth the money we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How are you going to use this!!
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use this in a running car going down the highway.....it'll work fine!! If you plan to use this camping, a few things. On low it uses 32 watts, over eight hours that is 256 watts. On medium it uses 52 watts or 416 watts over eight hours and on high 72 watts or over eight hours 576 watts. So you will need the appropriate power source that can handle that many watts. You will need to use this with another blanket or sleeping bag to help keep the heat in. It's not a bad item and heats up quickly, just wish it was bigger....but that would require more power!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Aldous

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blanket to have on the road. We tend to be out on the road all the time and I know that my mom needs a blanket usually because its cold in the morning. So I'm very happy that I was able to get this blanket. So far things are looking great - and I hope to purchase another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: DesignerGyrl

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my college student for Christmas. We live in the North East, and our winters can be brutal. My daughter’s car takes forever to warm. She loves this blanket and is so pleased with it. I used it today, and it kept me snug and warm during my winter travels. I highly recommend everyone have one or two of these in their vehicle. These would be wonderful in vehicles as well during automotive breakdowns.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Warms up Fast
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as I expected. It's quite large and warms up fast!
customer_reviews.author: Shanara Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I bought this for my elderly mother who is ALWAYS cold. I keep it in the van and prewarm it before taking her to doctor appts. She loves it. Not only does it keep her warm, it gets her seat warm before she gets into the vehicle. It’s wonderful on freezing mornings. It arrived on time and packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little toasty warm and convenient blanket! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! The only disadvantage is that it is not larger. I went camping for five days recently and this blanket worked as a perfect warm and toasty layer under my warm blankets. I used it several times during the night. I appreciate the ability to choose the length of time the blanket stays on for. Great quality and soft! Two wishes: 1) wish it was larger 2) wish it was thicker Fabulous product overall!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Sojoy Temperature Controller Keeps Blinking when Pressed
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Just received it today; out of the box not working right. $29 Blanket is nice but temp control does not work; all LEDs keep blinking and cannot select Medium or High, plus no heat coming out of it. Sending this back. Also ordered the other one that is only $15, and hope that one works, then will buy more as soon as they send me something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Ramazon

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver when living in my van
customer_reviews.text: While living in a van for 6 months, I used this almost every night, either plugged into the cigarette lighter when the car was running or plugged into my goal zero battery which was connected to a solar panel on the roof. This thing saved my life! Not literally, but it was so nice to have a little luxury like this while camping. It heats up to a nice temperature and I like how it has three temperature levels to choose from, and three chooses for an auto shut off. Highly recommend for any vehicle travel or camping!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Is your wife always cold in the car but you don't want to sweat it out while the heat is blasted? Get this thing, it will warm her up without having to create a sauna in the car. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pilling

customer_reviews.title: Wont power up!
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful blanket, nice size and comfortable, however it will not power up. We try to turn it on and it flashes once and goes off! For medical reasons I cannoy stay warm so I needed the heat to work. Basically its worthless to me
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: great heater for your bed with 12 volt adaptor
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC unit to keep your feet warm in a Kings Size bed when placed at the bottom of the covers at the feet location over sheet. I had a spare 12vDC cigarette power supply that I used to power unit (2 amps minimum). With the 1 hour timer, it gets unit ready while I brush my teeth and then keeps me warm unit I fall asleep. Great. tjcooper
customer_reviews.author: tjcooper

customer_reviews.title: Slow heat
customer_reviews.text: Good size to use in the car, but i’m not sure if it’s defective or not but the heating process is VERY SLOW and I’m not sure how you can clean the blanket. Other than that soft and good size. The cord is long enough but get in your way.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very cozy. Blanket doesn't get as warm as I would like, but thats probably for safety? I wish I could purchase one with a thermostat. My spouse burns up and I freeze so this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first month :(
customer_reviews.text: My electric blanket broke within the first 30 days of use and I cannot seem to get a hold of anyone to request a new one.😕 --Update-- I found the customer service number online and talked to nice a gentleman today who said he's sending me out a new blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Torres

customer_reviews.title: 12=volt blanket
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this blanket... but it was not full size as i expected. Okay , so i could live with that. But the blanket just stopped working after using it only 3 times. I thought maybe it was how I had it plugged in, so i checked it - nope. Plug and play basically - but it would not warm up. I am disappointed because now it have a small blanket, that doesn't heat up and has a wire in it so its very uncomfortable. I wouldn't recommend this as it won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use this to keep my 3 year old daughter warm in the car in the winter. It keeps her warm and is big enough to cover her completely with room to spare. Warms up quickly too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and did not work. Very upsetting as a gift. I would like my Amazon account credited back the amount paid of this blanket please I can not return as she lives far away and I only see her like twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tiley

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: My heat stopped on my driver side this winter. I don't know if this was defective or what but it never got very warm. I returned it. Wish it had worked.
customer_reviews.author: MsBunny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my oldest sons fiancé. She loves it. Can’t wait till I get another for myself. Arrived quickly. Packaged nice. Will buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Husband, he is a truck driver so he sleeps in his truck most nights waiting for places to open. Its been really cold where we live temps getting down to the teens at night while he's sleeping. He loves this blanket, he says it keeps him warm enough to sleep comfortably even after the blanket shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fall
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my side by side to keep warm in the fall and it works Perfect!! Warms up quickly and small enough to put in the storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat up: returned
customer_reviews.text: unfolded and plugged in for more than 5 minutes and could not feel it heat up at all. Returned
customer_reviews.author: forest farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got wasn’t heating up the whole blanket so I reached out to the seller and they were awesome! They got right back to me and sent me a new one. I will definitely order products from this company again knowing they care!
customer_reviews.author: Brea G

customer_reviews.title: Momma Mia
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for my Mom because she is always heating the car to the point that I am melting. Soni got her a blanket to stay warm and leave me comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annabisme

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My daughter complained on cold morning because her brother got the butt warmer in the front seat now I turn the blanket on to warm her seat when I warm up the car. She loves it. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: kdshorn

customer_reviews.title: It does heat up
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we were moving up north-far north and wanted to use it in the car but I just ended up using my heated seats instead
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket to use while camping in cold weather. As soon as it arrived I wanted to test it to make sure I would be warm enough. The minute I plugged it in the lights on the remote just started flashing. That blanket is not getting warm and I can not adjust the temperature settings. I didn’t notice how many people had the same issue until after I purchased. Save your money and don’t buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dad!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Dad who is always cold. ALWAYS COLD. So I got this for his truck because he is always on the road somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Annabisme

customer_reviews.title: Does not get warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Does not get hot at all on high, and it will takes about at least 10mins to just get a little bit warm but that is not enough at all
customer_reviews.author: O1091359

customer_reviews.title: Plug gets HOT
customer_reviews.text: Blanket is thin material. Does not get very hot compared to other heated blankets. Plug got so warm from 20 minutes of use that it burned my hand when I took it out. This thing is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: kara scharmer

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Seems to take a while to heat up. But eventually does and provides a little bit of heat, not very much.
customer_reviews.author: JE1058

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. We had to get a usb adapter because her car has no cigarette lighter, but works fine with the adapter
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you got a good battery in your car
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my son to use whenever he goes snowboarding in the mountains and he actually camps in his car. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket because I am always cold and it's very nice and soft. The added heating element in it takes about 10minutes to warm up
customer_reviews.author: Christina F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket to have if your heater doesn’t work in the winter or if you’re going camping in cold weather. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn T.

customer_reviews.title: Good-Quality Blanket
customer_reviews.text: It is quite convenient to have a heated blanket in car when traveling especially when someone needs a rest and takes a nap for a long road trip. The texture of the blanket is soft and the temperature is moderate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Seren Liu

customer_reviews.title: Travel blanket
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blanket until it suddenly stopped working 1.5 months after I bought it. Do not recommend because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Auriel

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm in long cold car rides
customer_reviews.text: Kept my wife warm while Fall Foliage sightseeing rides through the mountains of Vermont.
customer_reviews.author: JRMIAMI

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet but good to have the n your car
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had to use yet but great safety item to have in your car
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother who drives a school bus. She absolutely loved it for late night trips to sporting events in the cold winter months. She and I would highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Banas

customer_reviews.title: Nice little car blanket
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep my wife cozy in the new car.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: They need to make a USB desk friendly version!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my coworker who is always cold! I feel like you should have a USB connection so you can put it at a desk or something that would be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Secret shopper

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: This blanket lasted with little use less then one year. I wouldn't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has auto shut off
customer_reviews.text: You can not sit on this ,you can drape or wrap it around you or over you.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: No heat besides what I generate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use in my car on my breaks at work so I dont have to run the heater. I still have to run heater since the blanket does not warm up like electric blankets should. I tried just wrapping the blanket around an arm and did not feel heat in 30 minutes. Sending back and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Is for wife. She uses it when she drives. She is very haopy with her new blankey.
customer_reviews.author: dan ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It has a little bit smell
customer_reviews.text: It is good, it warm up the blanket very fast, the only issue is it has a little bit smell when you charge it to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Laugh

customer_reviews.title: cheap electronic internals
customer_reviews.text: This product broke on the 20th time I turned it on. I worked great for 19 power cycles, then on the 20th time, all the lights came on and buttons became unresponsive. Every subsequent time I've tried to turn it on, the same thing happens, all lights turn on and stay on and buttons are unresponsive. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Camargo

customer_reviews.title: 5 thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Unit malfunctioned less than 30 after purchase. All the lights stay on and from reading the other reviews, in not alone. They say you get what you pay for so just spend the extra money on a brand you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my diabetic wife who's always cold in the car. She loves it, and uses it constantly (obviously not when she's driving) and everyone else is happy too...
customer_reviews.author: David Easley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Never got as hot as I expected it to but still enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: delinda cline

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without it! Heats up very quickly ( within 2 minutes) and is just as warm as my electric blanket on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: fun and challenging..

customer_reviews.title: Your Significant Other will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my perpetually chilly lady friend on her way to work. She uses it everyday and has great things to say.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS. I am always cold and especially in my car since it takes forever to warm up. This is amazing because it warms up quickly and is so comfy! A great thing to have especially if you live in a colder climate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Soft blanket and it gets very warm! However, I am returning this item because it only works with the cigarette lighter in your car, which I guess I completely missed in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: MommyX3

customer_reviews.title: Id buy more of they were bigger
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was bigger. Definitely gets the job done though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to heat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend, a postal carrier in rural West Virginia. At first she thought it didn't work, but apparently one has to set the timer, and it takes a while to heat up but she says it does heat up and is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: annaheartscats

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket to use on our boat. Used it for maybe 30 minutes and it quit working. I’m vary disappointed in this blanket I wouldn’t recommend this. I hope the seller reaches out to me and makes it right. I will update if that happens
customer_reviews.author: Judy R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Soft blanket and keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved , they go camping and travel keeps her warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Blanket
customer_reviews.text: With this blanket it was perfect when I went to Northern California and wanted to keep warm without having the heat on the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Mine never worked.
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I tried to use it and didn't work. all the lights come on, but doesn't do anything else. Ordered too long ago to return it. If you order check yours work 1st thing. The blanket feel is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Funk

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother in Wisconsin. He loves it. Keeps him warm on his long drives
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gude

customer_reviews.title: Did not get hot!
customer_reviews.text: Did not get hot! Will be returning. Even on high it was a faint heat, very disappointed and now have to be hassled with returning it and buying a different blanket in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Took this blanket camping and outside at 40 degrees it did a nice job keeping both my wife and myself comfortable. I would treat it with care though as I think it could stop working quickly if misused.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Nasto

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this blanket. We live in upstate NY, so it can get pretty cold. This blanket keeps them toasty warm on the way to school in the early morning. Perfect size for my Honda Civic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not Work - no electric heating
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blanket as a Christmas present - it does not work, no heating provided when plugged into an auto. Unfortunately, the recipient didn't let us know of the problem till after the return window. So now we have this junk blanket - waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: John Hreno

customer_reviews.title: Plug in gets extremely HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Used this blanket twice. Very comfortable and nice. BUT... After the second time I used this blanket I went to unplug it from the charger and the plug in piece was so hot I dropped it. Was still warm to the touch more than 10 minutes later. Won’t use it again as I’m too concerned it’s a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend who has no heat in her car. New England weather can be brutal and this has helped her get through till her heat gets fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it! I have tried it a few times in her vehicle and it heats up really well. It needs a few minutes to get up to temperature, but it is great for cold winter days and longer drives.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: This Sojoy heated blanket is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this blanket. I plug it in every morning so it will be good and warm for her ride to school.It really works great.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Almost to good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the bed I have in my van. Wish the temp control had degrees rather than hi, medium, low. Using it most nights in January. Happy to have this.
customer_reviews.author: David Dickey

customer_reviews.title: For my kids.
customer_reviews.text: Heater in my car doesn't work. So I got this for my kids. They love it. Keeps them warm. Definitely makes me feel better about driving with them when it is freezing out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Sot and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This letter blanket is great! Would I turned the car on time we got in the car! The blanket it’s soft and cozy without plug in already warm ! Timer is safe for overheated ! Recommend and happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: kelly  T.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 1/2 a cold season
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about 1/2 of a winter before the plug-in melted in the outlet and stopped working. When it did work, it was great - but kind of expensive for something that didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Witzel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great product and actually gets pretty warm! Got this for my friend as the heat is temperamental in her car. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany turner

customer_reviews.title: Controller does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged blanket into car power source and the blanket control does not work. ALL the control lights stay on continuously. Strongly advise against buying this car blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up very well
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice small car blanket But it doesn't heat up beyond the middle circle
customer_reviews.author: Terena Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit in 12V!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas and she can’t use it. Why? Because it won’t fit in the 12V cigarette lighter in the car!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Commute!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quick and has come in clutch many a cold morning. Highly recommend if you live in any region that gets below 40 more than 2 months a year.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love the blanket. The size is just right and great material. Very comfortable! The only downfall is the blanket could be a little hotter. I always have it on High to feel any heat. Otherwise it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Makes our mornings toasty!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved to an area that has very low temperatures during the winter. This little blanket helps her stay warm on her commute to work each morning!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: The blanket took 30 mins to get warm
customer_reviews.text: The blanket was not very soft and took almost 30 minutes to warm up I would not recommend this blanket to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sundelin

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the car to keep the kids warm until the car heater kicked in. Also use it waiting in the carline at pick up so Zi don’t have to keep running the engine in idle.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Carlyle

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad who has trouble regulating his temperature in the car. This blanket is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Worthing

customer_reviews.text: This is soooo nice to have! I live in the tundra known as Minnesota and this has really helped while I am heating up my car! It doesn’t get super hot but warm enough to hold me over until the heat kicks in!
customer_reviews.author: GCW

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have in the car on a cold day or if you get stuck in snow
customer_reviews.author: Lucille klitsch

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom. She is very cold natured. She loved it and uses it all the time :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Berninger

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom. She loved it so much i have given it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Kept my son toasty warm in his truck bed tent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keown

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as it could be
customer_reviews.text: It gets warm pretty fast, and the warmest setting can keep you warm in 30-40 degree weather. However only half of the blanket effectively warms. Only the spots where the wires run through get warm. the rest of the spots remain cold.
customer_reviews.author: Just Your Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Your best friend on a cold morning drive
customer_reviews.text: With temperatures in the single digits this is my wife's best friend on the drive to work
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife would always tell me that I had the car too cool while driving. Now she smiles and try to stay awake. She loves her electric blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This broke the first time my wife used it. She plugged it into the cars outlet and the plugger on the front of the plug fell apart. I'm gonna try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: george ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me toasty
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! The heater core went out in my car and the temperature has been in the twenties. I placed this blanket on my seat and it has kept from freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise De Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Kids staying warm
customer_reviews.text: The grandson’s use it riding their Gator & love it
customer_reviews.author: Freida Hickman

product_meta.title: Sojoy 12V Heated Smart Multifunctional Travel Electric Blanket for Car, Truck, Boats or RV with High/Low Temp Control (60"x 40") (Checkered Black & Burgundy)
feature_bullets: 12V Heated Smart multifunctional Travel Cars, SUVs, Trucks Camping Blanket is electrically-heated and plugs into your car's cigarette lighter socket
Equipped with thermostat and 3 level heat control for additional levels of heat and comfort
Quick to Heat-up & Great for cold winters, road trips, camping, RV's, or emergencies. Equipped with 30/45/60 minute timer to warm you up, keep you safe and not drain your battery
100% soft, high-quality polyester fleece with heat gives users a warm, cozy ride
30 Day Time Period for Free Returns!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars798 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
